# The `Plugin` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/linkgraphlinkinglayer/plugin">Plugin</a> instances can be added to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/objectlinkinglayer">ObjectLinkingLayer</a> to receive callbacks when code is loaded or emitted, and when JITLink is being configured. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::orc::LinkGraphLinkingLayer::Plugin</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/linkgraphlinkinglayer/plugin">Plugin</a> instances can be added to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/objectlinkinglayer">ObjectLinkingLayer</a> to receive callbacks when code is loaded or emitted, and when JITLink is being configured.
